com.airs.handlers

Interface Handler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AudioHandler, BeaconHandler, BloodPressureButtonHandler, CalendarHandler, CellHandler, EventButtonHandler, EventTextHandler, GPSHandler, HeartMonitorHandler, MediaWatcherHandler, MoodButtonHandler, MusicPlayerHandler, NotificationHandler, PhoneSensorHandler, RandomHandler, SystemHandler, WeatherHandler, WifiHandler

    public interface Handler
    Interface for sensor handlers

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] Acquire(String sensor, String query)
      Method to acquire sensor symbol
      void destroyHandler()
      Method to destroy resources of handler
      void Discover()
      Method to discover sensor symbols supported by a handler
      void History(String sensor)
      Method to provide a historical view of the given sensor
      String Share(String sensor)
      Method to share the current value of the given sensor

    • Method Detail

      • Acquire

        byte[] Acquire(String sensor,
             String query)
        Method to acquire sensor symbol
        Parameters:
        sensor - String of the sensor symbol to be acquired
        query - String of the query to be executed

      • Discover

        void Discover()
        Method to discover sensor symbols supported by a handler

      • destroyHandler

        void destroyHandler()
        Method to destroy resources of handler

      • Share

        String Share(String sensor)
        Method to share the current value of the given sensor
        Parameters:
        sensor - String of the sensor to be shared
        Returns:
        human-readable String representation of last value

      • History

        void History(String sensor)
        Method to provide a historical view of the given sensor
        Parameters:
        sensor - String ot the sensor to be shown
